remarks: Value of description binder ` D ` for a single-valued class expression ` C ( y ) ` (as in e.g. ~ reusv2 ).  Special case of ~ riota2f . (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-2013.)
statement:
riotasv2d.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
riotasv2d.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ y F ) $.
riotasv2d.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/ y ch ) $.
riotasv2d.4 $e |- ( ph -> D = ( iota_ x e. A A. y e. B ( ps -> x = C ) ) ) $.
riotasv2d.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y = E ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
riotasv2d.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y = E ) -> C = F ) $.
riotasv2d.7 $e |- ( ph -> D e. A ) $.
riotasv2d.8 $e |- ( ph -> E e. B ) $.
riotasv2d.9 $e |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
riotasv2d $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. V ) -> D = F ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x $.
$d E y $.
$d ps x $.
